headline: Talented Devops Node/GoLang developer
description.text:
Summary

At APSIS, we imagine a world where nobody gets a single spam message ever again.

Our vision is to help our customers communicate better with their users by allowing them to use their customer data more effectively. 

Work Description

Our new APSIS One platform is built from the ground up using brand new cloud-native technology and methods.

APSIS aims to work at the forefront of technology and development. We follow modern agile practices with cross-functional DevOps teams, where each team assumes complete technical and operational ownership of their applications. This includes implementation, architectural design and tech selection, QA, continuous delivery, and technical production environment operations. We believe in small, highly skilled, highly empowered and autonomous teams taking maximal ownership of their systems.

In a typical day this role will be working as part of such a team, working in close collaboration with their team members and other similar teams in Stockholm, Malmö, Warsaw and Rostov, and with their Product Owner. APSIS dev teams also have “20% time” where the team works outside the product backlog on tasks of their own choice.

Responsibilities

- As part of the development team, implement new features and solve engineering challenges in a modern, cloud-native, microservice-based tech stack.
- Take an active part in team development, knowledge sharing and improvements to increase team velocity and developer quality of life.
- Respond to disruptions and proactively work to prevent such from occurring in the first place. 


Requirements

- 2+ years / 5+ years / 7+ years of professional development experience with a robust software engineering background
- Professional experience with using Amazon Web Services (particularly ECS, RDS, DynamoDB, Lambda, API Gateway, ElasticSearch, CloudWatch, and supporting tools like IAM) and Docker in production systems
- Experience with Node and/or GoLang and ready to learn and pick up tasks in either language
- Proven ability to write high-performant, maintainable code
- Ability to operate in a DevOps environment
- Experience with working on CI/CD pipelines
- Interest in, and ability to work hands-on with managing your own cloud infrastructure on a daily basis
- Creative and solutions-oriented, someone who enjoys tackling big challenges and is not afraid to learn new things along the way

- Collaborative mindset, ability to work as part of a very distributed development organisation where many small teams need to coordinate


Bonus qualifications

- Experience with Angular, Typescript, React, Jasmine, ngrx
- Experience with Java, C# and .Net core
- AWS certifications or equivalent evidence of advanced AWS competency
- Experience with high performance / resilient microservices architecture is highly desirable
- Experience with REST API design, development and consumption
- Experience with distributed systems, queueing systems, event driven architecture
- Professional experience with building SaaS software, especially from web analytics or digital marketing or equivalent
- Experience from integration with 3rd party vendor systems


Position type

Full time


Please apply by providing your CV and a personal letter as soon as possible. We will hire as soon as we find the right person.



About us
At APSIS, we believe in enabling great marketing for our customers. As the leading provider of marketing solutions in the Nordics, our goal is to enable and simplify the workloads of our many global clients every day. We do this by creating simple yet scalable tools within digital marketing, including data management, targeted emails, lead management and e-commerce recovery. At the end of the day, it all comes down to one thing: our clients’ marketing success is our success. And we’re proud to be there for them, every step of the way. ...Intrigued? Find out more at apsis.com!

headline: Utvecklare Devops AWS, Stockholm
description.text:
Om konsultuppdraget

- Ort: Stockholm
- Uppdragslängd: Ca. 13 månader
- Uppdragsstart: Enligt ök.
- Sista ansökningsdagen: ansök snarast
- Omfattning: 100%
- OBS! Det är väldigt viktigt att du uppfyller skall-kraven för att vi överhuvudtaget ska kunna offerera dig, annars förkastar beställaren vårt anbud omgående där både din tid resp. vår tid går till spillo.


UppdragsbeskrivningKunden bygger nu en egen informations och dataplattform och söker utvecklare som kan förstärka sitt agila team som jobbar med en ny Big Data-plattform. Du kommer vara med i ett team som består av Lösningsarkitekt, Molnarkitekt, Säkerhetsarkitekt, Tech Lead, Produktägare, Data Engineer och andra Utvecklare. Senare också Data Scientists.

Plattformen måste hantera stora datamängder, integrera med många lösningar som är beroende av datamängden.

Du har erfarenhet av att sätta upp komponenter i AWS. Utöver det är du med fördel van att jobba med generell systemutveckling, shell, docker, konfigurationer. Kunden arbetar med en blandning av AWS-molnlösningar och egna implementeringar av Apaches lösningar. Eftersom Kunden är i ett tidigt stadium i utveckling är fokus på att bygga plattformen. Det innebär för närvarande att du måste vara öppet för bredare uppgifter, samt en hel de systemutveckling, konfigurering, sätta upp processer.

Obligatoriska kompetenser och erfarenhet (skallkrav):
- Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av devops
- Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att deploya, konfigurera och administrera mjukvara och komponenter i AWS
- Minst 1 års arbetslivserfarenhet av användning av docker, docker-compose och/eller kubernetes
- Minst 1 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att producera och deploya Infrastructure as code (CloudFormation eller Terraform)


______________________

Hur du kommer vidare

- Sök uppdraget genom denna annons
- I ansökan anger du ett kravställt timpris
- Lägg in ett CV i word-format
- Vi återkopplar genom plattformen om något behöver kompletteras eller förtydligas.
- Återkoppling sker vanligtvis från Kunden till oss inom 10 arbetsdagar  från det att ansökningstiden utgått. Vi försöker återkoppla omgående till dig som kandidat snarast vi har ny information avseende din ansökan eller uppdraget. Skulle återkoppling dröja, vänligen kontakta oss via plattformen.


Inför en eventuell intervju meddelas du om vilken Kunden är i god tid.



Konsult- och kompetenspartner inom IT, Management och Teknik.

Vi lägger ett stort fokus på kund-/konsultpartnernöjdhet och kvalité i våra leveranser och verkar idag i hela Sverige med utgångspunkt i Stockholm. Vårt motto är därför Ödmjukhet, Ihärdighet samt Flexibilitet.

Varmt välkommen att höra av dig vid frågor eller funderingar.

Annonsförsäljare undanbedes.

headline: DevOps and IT Manager
description.text:
Hands-on DevOps and IT Manager
Dirac is looking for an experienced, structured, and hands-on IT professional, to lead our DevOps and IT operations.
Dirac Research, one of Sweden’s emerging tech powerhouses, is a world-renowned audio technology company that is dedicated to inventing the future of sound across all product categories. Dirac is headquartered in Uppsala, Sweden, with offices in Shanghai, Shenzhen and Beijing as well as representatives in Japan, USA, Korea and Germany. Additionally, Dirac operates an R&D center in Copenhagen, Denmark. Undergoing an intense growth phase, the Dirac team consists of more than 80 people.
We are looking for an experienced, structured, and hands-on IT professional, to lead our DevOps and IT operations. You have concrete experience with Atlassian tools, such as Jira, Bitbucket, Bamboo and Confluence, from earlier IT positions with SW development organizations. Located in Uppsala or possibly Copenhagen, you will be part of a dedicated team, on a mission to enable superior sound experiences across content and devices, for everyone, through pioneering digital audio solutions. As a technology heavy organization, DevOps and IT are central in our efforts to seize the significant opportunities in the ongoing rapid growth of advanced, premium, and pervasive audio solutions.


Your challenge
You will take a very active and hands-on approach in implementation and maintenance of all Dirac IT systems, and work to make services available ubiquitously across Dirac functions and sites, including main R&D and customer operation sites in Sweden, Denmark, and China. You will be in charge of system and services monitoring, analysis, and documentation, as well as internal stakeholder communication on availability, maintenance, and use.
You will lead Dirac’s DevOps and IT operations, including planning, development and maintenance of needed infrastructure and services, to ensure high performance and high availability support for network, storage, office IT, backup, revision control, build, compute, test, release, and more.

You will be primary responsible for definition, planning and implementation of the general Dirac IT strategy and associated policies related to infrastructure, security, sourcing, etc. in close corporation with Dirac management and key stakeholders in e.g. R&D.
Qualifications
You have been part of the IT organization of a small or medium sized SW development company, where you have been actively involved in build-up and maintenance of DevOps and IT infrastructure. You have a proven ability to balance a very hands-on, can-do, and practical approach with a structured and strategic view.
Preferred candidates have:
Significant and proven experience from earlier positions, supporting similar organizations in their DevOps and IT needs.
Git, Bitbucket); code review (e.g. Gerrit); build (e.g. GCC, Clang, Visual Studio); automated testing (e.g. Jenkins, Bamboo); debugging and profiling (e.g. Valgrind); continuous integration and releasing; virtualization; scripting.


Excellent communication skills and fluency in spoken and written English.
A team-oriented attitude, as well as the ability to work independently.
Experience from international companies and collaboration with colleagues located in other sites.
This is an excellent opportunity for an accomplished IT professional to be part of a dedicated and highly competent team. We offer exciting challenges, great work environment and a chance to join a unique journey; to revolutionize the way the world hears.
We will review applications, and perform assessment and interviews, continuously.

headline: Cloud and DevOps Engineer
description.text:
Since early 2000 we have supported our clients on a vast number of projects, all over the world. Our consultant pool consists of Swedish and non-Swedish consultants within the fields of embedded systems, telecom, automotive, online solutions and application development.


You will be part of the cloud journey as they deliver cloud platform within the automotive industry and helping our client's cloud application team(s) move forward. Our client ensure high quality and adaptability in their delivery.
What you’ll do:
You will be working with the rest of the team to improve and operate the container based platform based on Kubernetes. 
# Container runtime and orchestration: Kubernetes, Docker
# Cloud: AWS, Aliyun, Azure
# Service mesh: Istio
# Databases: Cassandra, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis
# Tools: Terraform, Helm, Harbor
# CI/CD: Jenkins, GitLab, GitHub/Azure Devops, Spinnaker, ArgoCD
# Scripting and languages: Bash, Python, PowerShell, Ansible
# Observability: Grafana, Prometheus, ELK stack, Splunk, Jaeger, Sentry
# Security: Vault, Falco, Trivy
If you have experience and interest in also being Scrum Master for the team, there might be an opportunity for a combined role of Engineer and Scrum Master in the team.


Technical Experience/Skills/Certifications:
# Minimum of five (5) or more years of relevant experience as a SW engineer

# Documented Azure and/or AWS knowledge is essential
# Hands on experience in Kubernetes and Docker in AWS and/or Azure
# Experience in infrastructure automation with e.g. Terraform and Ansible
# Experienced in cloud services technologies


Start: asap.
Duration: longterm.
Extent: Full-time, 40h/week.
Compensation: Negotiable. We offer a competitive salary, primarily in the form of a longterm employment and according to Swedish standards; governmental pension plan, five weeks paid vacation, iPad/laptop, mobile phone with data plan subscription, income level insurance, life insurance, work liability insurance, language course support, sports activity contribution.


More information and benefits you will have as an employee in Sweden:
http://www.forsakringskassan.se/sprak/eng/
http://www.pensionsmyndigheten.se/AboutYourPensions_en.html


Join our team and be a part of a competitive and inspiring future!

headline: DevOps Specialist Digital X
description.text:
About the job
Right now we are looking for you who have experience working as DevOps specialist and are passionate about Continuous Build, Integration, Test, Deployment, Delivery and the DevOps-culture.
We believe that change happens when people with brave ideas come together. Today, the world both changes and unites by digitalisation. Every industry and society digitalise. We at AFRY are committed to drive the digital transformation, with the mission to accelerate the transition towards a more sustainable society.
We are now creating a new unit, Digital X, to work across our company to excel in our digital offerings to our clients. In Digital X we will work with the digital strategy and overall portfolio, together with colleagues in all parts of our company. We will manage the lifecycle of digital solutions, including development, maintenance and operation; and we will support the sales of those solutions. If you want to be a part of making future with digital transformation by contributing with your brave, creative and innovative ideas, join Digital X at AFRY.
What will you do?
In this role you will be responsible for defining and promoting best practice DevOps ways of working within AFRY Digital Factory. You will help the development teams to find their best ways of working and also promote this and make it available for the entire AFRY.
Further, you are service-oriented and a real team player. It is important that you have a positive approach and are open to new challenges.

Who are you?
We believe you are experienced within software development and have an engineering background or similar.
You have a strong interest in working agile in a DevOps culture to drive continuous improvements for the teams.
You have extensive experience within:

build / release frameworks (e.g. 
containers and cloud technology at production scale (Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Azure)

You also have experience within:

Software development and / or test automation
Python and other scripting languages
Deep understanding of different operating systems

And of course, we believe that you have a strong interest in digitalization!
Due to the current situation around Covid-19, some of our recruitment processes extend over time. We apologize for this and ask for your patience.

We offer
We are looking for someone who wants to be part of AFRY’s success story. Then we can offer you career opportunities in a modern workplace!

At AFRY you will be involved in developing innovative and sustainable solutions within infrastructure, energy and industry. We are always looking for the sharpest skills that can create a future society together with us. We hope you will learn as much from us as we will learn from you.

About the company
AFRY is an international engineering, design and advisory company. We support our clients to progress in sustainability and digitalisation.

We are 17,000 devoted experts within the fields of infrastructure, industry and energy, operating across the world to create sustainable solutions for future generations.

Making Future

headline: DevOps to Doro, Malmö/Madrid
description.text:
At Doro, we are dedicated to helping seniors live a better life. We care about the seniors – they are our heroes. Everyone should have the opportunity to live a fulfilling life without compromises. We want to make aging an independent, secure, and rich part of life.
Our wide portfolio of security and care solutions digitally connect generations and provide solutions for independent living, both inside and outside the home. Doro is the market leader in social alarms in Sweden, Norway and the United Kingdom and the global market leader in mobile phones for seniors.
Want to join us? We're looking for a DevOps with good knowledge in software development that shares our passion. If that's you, we'd love to hear from you!



Our offer

In an international organization, you will work in a small software organization where using innovative technology to help seniors is our core business. At Doro, we strive for a work-life balance, to give you a dynamic workplace where you can continue to develop your skills in a team where we co-operate and support each other.

You can choose to work from either our office in Malmö or Madrid. However, during the pandemic, we mostly work from home and do most of our meetings over Teams.


 About the position

Doro Care is a small software organization, so you will probably get your hands dirty in a little bit of everything. You will work closely with our architects and developers. Take full ownership of our deployment processes and be an ambassador for DevOps in our organization.


That said, here are some things you will likely work on:


• Deployment, configuration, maintenance of test, demo, and production environments.
• Deployment and configuration of databases and application servers: Nginx, Node, MongoDB, Redis, ActiveMQ, Elasticsearch.
• Network management and maintenance.
• Deployment, configuration, and management of integration and continuous delivery tools: Jenkins, Git.
• Create and improve on existing documentation.
• Active in making sure that our tooling and processes are continuously improving.
• Improve our CI/CD pipeline.
• Software development (probably not every day, but you will likely need to touch the code from time to time. Backend is written in Java/Python).
• Share knowledge about DevOps with our engineers.





We believe that you have at least 2 years or more experience from a similar position. Below is a list of the knowledge and personality traits that we think could help you succeed as DevOps at Doro. We understand that not all of them will be a perfect match for you. They are just a list of things we appreciate.


• You are passionate about what you do and have a high interest in keeping up with current best practices in your areas of expertise.
• Get stuff done and think independently about priorities and the bigger picture of what we are doing.
• Advanced knowledge of GNU/Linux system administration.
• Dockers in production environments (Portainer, Kubernetes, or Swarm).

• Deployment, configuration, and management of integration and continuous delivery tools: Jenkins, Git.
• Configuration and management of platform monitoring tools.



Just as we try to employ an agile process when we develop our product, we want our people to be agile too. So, if you feel like improving your skills in an area that is not currently your expertise, we applaud and encourage that!

We will interview candidates on an ongoing basis and therefore ask you to send in your CV today!

About Doro

Doro is a technology company focused on seniors. We develop services and products for seniors to live independent, fulfilling lives. Our wide portfolio of security and care solutions digitally connect generations and provide solutions for independent living, both inside and outside the home. Doro is the market leader in social alarms in Sweden, Norway, and the United Kingdom and the global market leader in mobile phones for seniors. Doro is a Swedish company with headquarters in Malmö and a sales operation in 27 countries. Doro’s shares are quoted on the Nasdaq Stockholm exchange. 1 000 co-workers, and net sales of SEK 2,063 million (EUR 195.4 million) were reported for 2019. www.doro.com/corporate

headline: Senior DevOps Engineer, Stockholm
description.text:
About the assignment:

- Location: Stockholm
- Duration: 6 months
- Start: TBD
- Apply: as soon as possible
- Extent: 100%
- Please note that the mandatory requirements have to be met in full in order for us to present your profile to our Customer.


Description

As a DevOps Engineer at AI, Analytics & Data, your mission is to work alongside colleagues in the team to develop scalable and production-ready Advanced Analytics and AI software.

Your main responsibilities will be:

- automate cloud infrastructure setup
- build resilient infrastructure to scale out the model training and prediction
- build end to end monitoring solutions for machine learning pipelines, and their infrastructure
- develop DevOps solution for data science AKA ML Ops
- develop technical capabilities to enable large scale machine learning solutions
- develop different reusable technical solution to speed up Advanced Analytics and AI product development, for example configuration management system, container management system, package management system, model management system, advanced data/application/cloud resource profiling


Mandatory competence and experience:

- Automation as part of your DNA, you are passionate about building zero touch system
- 5+ years’ experience in infrastructure management and DevOps. Expert in tool like Terraform, Ansible, Jenkins/Travis/GitLab CI, etc.

- Hands on experience with DevOps in microservice context, familiar with container technologies, like Docker, Kubernetes
- A good team-player mentality in agile team, you are willing to take different kinds of tasks to meet sprint commitment



Preferred competence

- Working experience in big data and machine learning related project will be a big plus

______________________



- Apply for the assignment through this ad.

- Upload your CV in word format.
- We will revert to you if we need further information or clarification regarding your application.
We aim to get back to you promptly with any new information regarding your application or the assignment. If you have not received any information from us within this time frame, please contact us through our platform.


You will be informed about the Customer should you be called to an interview.



Stockholm based consultancy and competence firm with focused on IT, Management and Technology.

We focus on customer / consultant satisfaction and quality in our services offered throughout Sweden.

Our core values are Humility, Perseverance and Flexibility.

Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions.

We politely decline all contact from ad vendors. Many thanks!

headline: DevOps Engineer till Dynamist
description.text:
Om företaget

Dynamist är ett svenskt ägarlett konsultbolag med det intressanta målet att skapa effektiva och säkra IT-lösningar åt sina kunder. Det uppnås genom hög grad av automatisering samt att nyttja teknologier som ligger i framkant, och dessutom genom långa och mångsidiga erfarenheter inom utveckling, systemintegration och förvaltning. Enkelt uttryckt, Dynamist överbryggar gapet mellan systemdrift och systemutveckling med ett tydligt mål, att signifikant minska kunders operationella kostnader. Dynamist är bolaget som lägger stor vikt på din personliga utveckling och hela bolaget bidrar till en kreativ och utmanande miljö. Bolaget satsar stenhårt på medarbetarna som är kärnan i bolagets fortsatta starka tillväxt.

Din roll som DevOps Engineer

I rollen som DevOps Engineer kommer du att tillhöra Dynamist-teamet om 9 medarbetare och arbeta med att skapa effektiva och säkra IT-lösningar åt Dynamist kunder. Dynamist utvecklar säker IT-infrastruktur genom konsulttjänster med fokus på säkerhet samt moln-, och automatiseringstjänster. Du kommer att jobba kundanpassat med allt ifrån hög grad av automatisering, utveckling, förvaltning till systemintegration. 

Dina kvalifikationer





För att lyckas i rollen som DevOps Engineer ser vi att du är nyfiken på ny teknik, har en passion för IT och är lösningsorienterad. Vidare är det viktigt att du är konsultmässig och trygg i mötet med kunder.

Vad företaget erbjuder dig

Dynamist är bolaget som lägger stor vikt på din personliga utveckling och hela bolaget bidrar till en kreativ och utmanande miljö. Bolaget satsar stenhårt på medarbetarna som är kärnan i bolagets fortsatta starka tillväxt. Dynamist är ett företag som drivs av passion. För att bygga rätt lagkänsla erbjuder bolaget tekniska forum eller som Dynamist kallar det Superhero, Dynameet och Hackathon. Som en i laget erbjuds du personlig utveckling genom externa konferenser, utbildningar, och bonus vid certifieringar.

Övrigt

Start: Omgående med hänsyn till uppsägningstid

Omfattning: Heltid, direktrekrytering

Plats: Stockholm

Låter rollen som DevOps till Dynamist intressant? Urvalet sker löpande tveka därför inte att ansöka redan idag! Det är vi på Needo som håller i rekryteringsprocessen men du blir direkt anställd av Dynamist. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

headline: Technical Architect DevOps engineer
description.text:
Who we are

We’re here to connect you to what matters most, and by doing so, empowering societies. As a Telenor employee, you will be part of a large, international organisation that goes beyond customers – we want to play an important role in the societies we serve. Being connected can change your life, and we’re serious about helping our services make the widest possible impact.

We are looking for a curious and engaged person to join our Network Digital Infrastructure OSS & NMS Team. Telenor is rapidly heading towards the digital future and we are looking for people with a natural proactive drive who wants to make a difference. 

What you’ll do

As a Technical Architect Devops Engineer, you will be part of an experienced team with wide and deep knowledge of systems, supporting both the fixed and mobile networks. You will be the main point of contact for several different Network Support Systems. You and the team will be working from strategy, analysis and design to troubleshooting and operational tasks. You will work with different stakeholders within Telenor and prioritize the technical backlog as well as setting technology and solution strategies. You will work across the organization and work towards different stakeholders, in an agile way of working.

A role within Telenor Sweden gives a wide network. Telenor is a global service provider with career possibility. It is up to you how far you want to go. You can expect exciting tasks and great joy of work.

Who are you

Come join us now

headline: AWS DevOps Ecosystem SME
description.text:
Help us improve access to life-changing therapies that can transform human health
We are Cytiva, a global provider of technologies and services that advance and accelerate the development and manufacture of therapeutics. Formerly part of GE Healthcare, we have a rich heritage tracing back hundreds of years, and a fresh beginning since 2020.


Our customers undertake life-saving activities. These range from fundamental biological research to developing innovative vaccines, biologic drugs, and novel cell and gene therapies. Our job is to supply the tools and services -the pots, pans, soups and sauces -they need to work better, faster and safer, leading to better patient outcomes.


We are looking for a AWSDevOps Ecosystem SMEto work with our expertDevOps Tools Serviceteam of 15+ employees across the world. Then we would love to hear from you.


What you’ll do
Analysing, executing, and streamlining DevOps practices. Capture and share best-practice knowledge amongst the AWS solutions architect/developers. Architecting overall, comprehensive, and efficient practices.
Work with internal teams to create the migration process of legacy systems to the AWS cloud. Automating processes with the right AWS PAAS tools.
Facilitating development process and operationsand Establishing a suitable DevOps channel across the organization
Setting up a continuous build environment to speed up software development and deployment process
Guiding developers and operation teams in case of anissueand ability to manage teams with a leadership mindset





Who you are
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or in "STEM" Majors (Science, Technology, Engineering and Math) with strong professional experience of 10+ years in DevOps Environment and hands on experience designing Scalable AWS solutions. Up to date on Agile & DevOps knowledge of its benefits and actual experience implementing as a champion.
products and their design/usage. Deep knowledge of the primary AWS services (EC2, ELB, RDS, Route53, S3 & AWS-IoT)
Evaluate, provide recommendations, and enhance the existing DevOps architecture, configuration, procedures and processes to provide a more robust, dependable, efficient and flexible systemImplement automated processes to support streamlining of engineering/administrative duties.

Leader someone with conviction who is not afraid to debate ideas in a polite manner backed by facts/industry-research etc, but also knows when to back off and seek leadership help to build alignment top down, or let things play out.
Years of experience building great software using updated toolswith visionary skills, Leadership mindset and excellent communication and verbal skills.
Tier 2 and 3 support on resolving issues with underlying virtual infrastructureand application functionality taking into considering infrastructure dependencies. Perform and document installation and configuration of the platforms
Who we are
Whatever your role, we bring purpose and challenge into our everyday work. If you are driven to make the world a better place thanks to science and medicine, you’ll feel right at home here. If you’re flexible, curious and relentless, you’ll belong. If you are excited about a global culture, this can be the place to further your career.


Want to know more? Experience life at Cytiva on our Careers website, Instagram channel or LinkedIn page!

headline: DevOps Engineer, Tobii Tech
description.text:
Tobii is the world leader in eye tracking – a technology that allows a computer to tell exactly where a person is looking. Eye tracking is used in a broad range of applications, including market research and eye-controlled computer interfaces. Headquartered in Stockholm Tobii covers the global market with offices in USA, China, Japan, Norway, UK, and South Korea. If you want to work with meaningful products and solve interesting problems, we are the right company for you!


Role and responsibilities
As a DevOps Engineer at Tobii Tech you will be an important member of our software core team. A cross functional shared service team that is responsible for creating software architecture and a scalable, highly automated, development environment for 100+ developers. You will help develop infrastructure and practices to enable rapid, high quality releases from a large C++ code base.
Your days will be filled with:
• Hands on building and optimizing the build pipelines for our product
• Together with the team, evolve the architecture, strategies, and processes
• Work closely with the product teams to identify bottlenecks and issues
• Keep track of the latest tools and practices we can use



We are looking for someone with experience in
• At least few years work experience from similar roles
• Experience with CI/CD tools. Jenkins, Artifactory or similar
• Experience with build system/orchestration tools (bazel, cmake)
• Github
• Container technologies (docker)


Being a Tobiian
We are looking for you who are a team player that likes to perform tasks and solve problems together with others. Someone who thinks knowledge-sharing is important, is easy going and invite and participate in discussions with team members and members of other teams. You probably have a passion for software development and producing readable, reusable, and efficient code and are that prestige less go-to person that can see possibilities and thrive for better quality and smarter solutions.



Working at Tobii is like being in the heart of innovation. Here you get to work on cool creative projects, together with passionate colleagues from all around the world. Our technology brings a voice to people with speech impairments, it helps us understand human behavior and it is revolutionizing the way we interact with technology. 
If you want to build a company rather than just work for one. If you take pride in honest hard work and want to perform freely in an open environment where you can be yourself, you will feel right at home.
Watch this video if you want to learn more about us.
Next step! At Tobii, we move quickly!
Welcome!

headline: DevOps to Doro, Malmö/Madrid
description.text:
At Doro, we are dedicated to helping seniors live a better life. We care about the seniors – they are our heroes. Everyone should have the opportunity to live a fulfilling life without compromises. We want to make aging an independent, secure, and rich part of life.
Our wide portfolio of security and care solutions digitally connect generations and provide solutions for independent living, both inside and outside the home. Doro is the market leader in social alarms in Sweden, Norway and the United Kingdom and the global market leader in mobile phones for seniors.
Want to join us? We're looking for a DevOps with good knowledge in software development that shares our passion. If that's you, we'd love to hear from you!



Our offer

In an international organization, you will work in a small software organization where using innovative technology to help seniors is our core business. At Doro, we strive for a work-life balance, to give you a dynamic workplace where you can continue to develop your skills in a team where we co-operate and support each other.

You can choose to work from either our office in Malmö or Madrid. However, during the pandemic, we mostly work from home and do most of our meetings over Teams.


 About the position

Doro Care is a small software organization, so you will probably get your hands dirty in a little bit of everything. You will work closely with our architects and developers. Take full ownership of our deployment processes and be an ambassador for DevOps in our organization.


That said, here are some things you will likely work on:


• Deployment, configuration, maintenance of test, demo, and production environments.
• Deployment and configuration of databases and application servers: Nginx, Node, MongoDB, Redis, ActiveMQ, Elasticsearch.
• Network management and maintenance.
• Deployment, configuration, and management of integration and continuous delivery tools: Jenkins, Git.
• Create and improve on existing documentation.
• Active in making sure that our tooling and processes are continuously improving.
• Improve our CI/CD pipeline.
• Software development (You will also be a developer from time to time. Backend is written in Java/Python).
• Share knowledge about DevOps with our engineers.





We believe that you have at least 2 years or more experience from a similar position. Below is a list of the knowledge and personality traits that we think could help you succeed as DevOps at Doro. We understand that not all of them will be a perfect match for you. They are just a list of things we appreciate.


• You are passionate about what you do and have a high interest in keeping up with current best practices in your areas of expertise.
• Get stuff done and think independently about priorities and the bigger picture of what we are doing.
• Advanced knowledge of GNU/Linux system administration.
• Dockers in production environments (Portainer, Kubernetes, or Swarm).

• Deployment, configuration, and management of integration and continuous delivery tools: Jenkins, Git.
• Configuration and management of platform monitoring tools.
• Software development in backend for python or java



Just as we try to employ an agile process when we develop our product, we want our people to be agile too. So, if you feel like improving your skills in an area that is not currently your expertise, we applaud and encourage that!

We will interview candidates on an ongoing basis and therefore ask you to send in your CV today!

About Doro

Doro is a technology company focused on seniors. We develop services and products for seniors to live independent, fulfilling lives. Our wide portfolio of security and care solutions digitally connect generations and provide solutions for independent living, both inside and outside the home. Doro is the market leader in social alarms in Sweden, Norway, and the United Kingdom and the global market leader in mobile phones for seniors. Doro is a Swedish company with headquarters in Malmö and a sales operation in 27 countries. Doro’s shares are quoted on the Nasdaq Stockholm exchange. 1 000 co-workers, and net sales of SEK 2,063 million (EUR 195.4 million) were reported for 2019. www.doro.com/corporate

headline: DevOps & Quality Lead
description.text:
Who are we?
Volvo Cars is a company on a mission; to bring traditional car manufacturing into a connected, sustainable and smart future.
Since 1927, we have been a brand known for our commitment to safety, creating innovative cars that make life less complicated for our consumers. In 2010, we decided to transform our business, resulting in a totally new generation of cars and technologies, as well as steady growth and record sales. 
We are constantly pushing our own skills and abilities to drive change in the automobile industry like never before. We are looking for innovative, committed people to join us in this endeavour and create safe, sustainable and connected cars. We believe in the power of people and will challenge and support you to reach your full potential. Join us and be part of Volvo Cars’ journey into the future.

What's in it for you
If you are the right person for this role you will be given the opportunity to understand and contribute to the creation and execution of the customer journey for B2B and B2C sales and deliver in an agile fashion based on masterplans, capability roadmaps and architecture blueprints. We rapidly need to understand and leverage on the key foundations to find, attract, and manage new and current customers in a stellar fashion. Furthermore, you will build and maintain a network internally and externally for learnings and deliverables as well as setting up a team and competence plan within own area and related to others. This will require you to cross functionally lead, define, and deliver in the establishment of a world class company with other Digital leaders in an agile fashion working our way through a separation from mother companies and into a new self-sustained reality. Lastly you will actively contribute and role model a culture of transparency, fun, passion, ownership, and willingness for success.



We are now looking for a digital leader of our Digital team, Head of DevOps and Quality. In this capacity you will be working with a group of skilled software engineers, architects and products specialists. You will be part in exploring, building and supporting the digital landscape to take the ICE/PES commercial landscape to the next level.

Your skills and what you’ll do
We are searching for a person with excellent knowledge of DevOps engineering and automation practices E2E such as CI/CD; code, build, test, deploy, release and monitoring. Moreover, in depth understanding of Release synchronization on solution level (SAFe) are key competency areas. Given that we are setting a complete business E2E experience of the fundaments of commercial, corporate and industrial architectures makes your profile competitive. Given that the job will include establishment of new products and well as legacy ones there will be a quite big extent of change management as a natural part of the job. 


Together with your team, you will:
  *  Coordinate and enable cross product stream quality, CI/CD. Deploy on demand release on a cadence
  *  Continuously evolve toolchains used to enhance automation cross product streams and teams
  *  Minimize dependencies to optimize the continuous delivery pipeline
  *  Enable test automation and quality automation efficiency
  *  Implement monitoring solutions to enable stable operation
  *  CI/CD Toolchain
  *  Facilitate continuous improvements in quality aspects
  *  Leverage agile methodology for software configuration, development and deep experience with Agile tools.
  *  Ensure critical competence in the teams balancing employees, consultancy services, and bought services.
  *  Protecting the long term technical integrity of the area in close collaboration with the architectural function.




Last application date – 28th of February 202. Please note that applications via email will not be accepted due to GDPR. Interviews will be held continuously, and this recruitment can be completed before last application date.

description.text:
Arbetet kommer att utföras i ett Agilt internationellt team med högt tempo och öppenhet för ny teknik.


Du bör ha erfarenhet av arbeta i Microsoft Azure(Azure DevOps), AWS, eller Google Cloud.


Bra om du har arbetat med de flesta av följande verktyg: GIT, Jenkins, Bamboo, Chef, Puppet, Ansible, Maven, Gradle, Docker, Kubernetes and CI\CD Devops
Du ska även ha kunskap i följande: Spring Boot, Spring core, Spring MVC, Struts, Hibernate, JPA, Web Services, Angular JS, React JS


Du bör även ha erferanhet av SQL och databaser.

headline: DevOps CI Architect (490582)
description.text:
Ericsson’s investments in innovation have delivered the benefits of telephony and mobile broadband to billions of people around the world ensuring our solutions - and our customers - are at the forefront of innovation. We support networks that connect more than 2.5 billion subscribers. With close to 100,000 employees and customers in 180 countries, we combine global scale with technology and service leadership. 
We are now looking for a DevOps CI Architect who understands the full software development lifecycle and knows how to integrate all aspects of it into a CI/CD pipeline across multiple tools, deployment environments, and technologies. This is true of both application code and infrastructure-as-code. You will take part in crafting and developing a new CI/CD pipeline and your role will include development activities such as: requirement analysis, system design, architecture design, software design, integration, verification, simulations, tools design, Product Lifecycle Management support and product documentation. We coordinate in multi-functional development teams in which continuous improvement and innovation is part of the daily work.

You will be:
Drive strategic technical leadership
Perform continuous analysis and requirement handling.
Perform trouble shooting and customer support
Drive continuous improvements of tools and development environment
Develop competence in technical domain




General IP network knowledge and IP routing/firewalling
Experience in DevOps
Experience in CI/CD Pipeline Development


Additional language knowledge like C and Golang (beneficial)

Ability to work with complex system
Ability to work in team
Flexibility, quick learning skills


Qualifications:
Education: BSC or MSC diploma
Min 5 years of experience
Domain experience
Product development knowledge and Product Lifecycle Management knowledge
Business understanding
Experience working with people and networking
Innovating, adapting and responding to change approach
Ability to deliver results and meet customer expectations
Planning and organizing skills


What´s in it for you?
Here at Ericsson, our culture is built on over a century of courageous decisions. With us, you will no longer be dreaming of what the future holds – you will be redefining it. You won’t develop for the status quo, but will build what replaces it. Joining us is a way to move your career in any direction you want; with hundreds of career opportunities in locations all over the world, in a place where co-creation and collaboration are embedded into the walls. You will find yourself in a speak-up environment where empathy and humanness serve as cornerstones for how we work, and where work-life balance is a priority. Welcome to an inclusive, global company where your opportunity to make an impact is endless.

What happens once you apply?

Location for this role: Göteborg, Sweden

This position reports to: Manager Development Environment
Last day to apply: 2021-02-05

Kindly note that we cannot process applications sent via email.
Curious to know more about the life at Ericsson? Meet some of your future colleagues and watch our People film

At Ericsson, we do.
We provide equal employment opportunities without regard to race, color, gender, sexual orientation, transgender status, gender identity and/or expression, marital status, pregnancy, parental status, religion, political opinion, nationality, ethnic background, social origin, social status, indigenous status, disability, age, union membership or employee representation and any other characteristic protected by local law or Ericsson’s Code of Business Ethics.
Primary country and city: Sweden (SE) || || Göteborg || R&D

headline: DevOps Engineer – Cloud Engineer
description.text:
Inter IKEA Group have started the digital journey. This is a journey which requires a new technology foundation to be established for Core Business. We have started the work to set up the technical services needed to support an IT landscape that will be developed and operated in a hybrid multi-cloud model. We will contribute to IKEA direction by making it possible for any 'XaaS' to be translated into an affordable, accessible and sustainable product.

These services will enable us to create a better IKEA. We are looking for the people that take an individual responsibility to make sure that we deliver together as a team. Great colleagues, believing in a great IKEA vision with curiosity, drive and technical competence with a desire to make a difference, please come and join us. We take a leading approach; transforming complexity for the few into simplicity for the many. IKEA culture and values will guide us on the way, today and tomorrow.

IKEA offers you an exciting and inspirational work environment with a global presence. As the world’s leader at life at home, you have exceptional opportunities to grow and develop together with us. You will be working in an agile team setup with the goal to provide outstanding cloud services in a hybrid multi cloud model.

What will you do:
Contribute to the implementation of  the Inter IKEA technology direction and strategy around cloud adoption
Establish and manage the setup of Azure and AWS cloud platforms, meaning design, implement, deploy and maintain the cloud environments from development to production
Engage with consumers of the cloud services to provide support, expertise and guidance to enable them to leverage from the cloud in best possible way.
Develop capabilities in our cloud platforms to support a self-serve delivery model
Work with automation and infrastructure pipelines (Infrastructure as code)
Drive continuous improvements of platforms, tools and processes connected to the cloud services
Ensure security aspect of the cloud services in order to protect and secure IKEAs brand
Stay up to date with latest digital trends and cloud services that IKEA can benefit from




Please send us your application – CV and letter of motivation – in English. We really want to get to know you, so make sure you tell us why you would be a good fit for this role. We are interviewing continuously and will close the advert when we find the right candidate. 



IKEA Range & Supply has the responsibility to develop, design, produce and supply IKEA stores with home furnishing solutions available to the many people. Each year IKEA Range & Supply introduce 2,000 new products in the IKEA stores.

headline: Chas söker utvecklare inom DevOps
description.text:
Vi söker nu fler duktiga utvecklare inom DevOps som vill arbeta med spännande uppdrag som konsult hos oss på Chas!
JOBBA MED OSS
Tycker du att det är viktigt att jobba på ett företag som har högt ställda värderingar? Ett bolag där entreprenörskap och samhällsnytta går hand i hand. På Chas vill vi inte enbart satsa på att ge våra konsulter högsta möjliga kompetens och de allra bästa uppdragen. Vi vill också ge tillbaka till samhället. Vi tycker även att det är viktigt att ha kul, därför åker vi på en utlandskonferens varje år och har minst ett roligt event per månad. Alla på bolaget är välkomna! !
På Chas har vi individen i fokus och vill förverkliga konsultens potential genom att få dem att utvecklas och bredda sin kompetens. Vi arbetar med många häftiga företag inom olika branscher. Några exempel är DICE, Rovio, Spotify, H&M, SEB, Telenor och SAS. Det finns alltid något för alla. Chas driver sin egna skola där våra konsulter får gå kurser gratis. Kanske vill du som Chassare fördjupa dig i Node.Js eller lära dig Swift? Inga problem!
Chas är ett företag som verkligen satsar på CSR-arbete, vi tror på att göra mer än att bara donera pengar. Vi har hållit utvecklingskurser i socialt utsatta områden och delat ut mat till hemlösa. Vill du också vara med och påverka samhället och kanske har ett eget CSR-projekt du brinner för? Då vill vi prata mer med dig!
Tillsammans här på Chas delar vi många erfarenheter, värderingar, förmåner och intressen. Det är vi tillsammans som utgör Chas och att vara en Chassare innebär att du blir en del av vår familj!
OM JOBBET
Vi söker dig som jobbat med DevOps i minst 2 år och har goda kunskaper inom backend-språk som: Python, Node.js, SQL och Java, samt att du suttit i Azure. Det är meriterande om du tidigare arbetat med AWS.
Självklart är du en lagspelare som lätt arbetar i team eller på egen hand om så krävs.
OM OSS
Chas har utsetts till Europas bästa arbetsgivare av European Business Awards som arrangerar Europas största företagstävling. Bland annat för vårt demokratiska arbetssätt med möjlighet till inflytande för medarbetarna samt vårt sätt att arbeta med förmåner och personlig karriärutveckling. Resultatet är att vi bedriver ett omfattande CSR-arbete, har startat upp en YH-skola som utbildar nya fullstack-utvecklare och har ett produktbolag.


Som anställd på Chas erbjuder vi dig möjlighet att arbeta med nya moderna tekniker hos våra kunder som är marknadsledande företag inom privat och offentlig sektor. Vi ger dig tillfälle att delta i konferenser och att utvecklas som person och som webbutvecklare. Du får också en mentor och access till vårt utbud av personalförmåner.

UCG/Radio Support is a consulting company based in Kista in northern Stockholm. Regardless placement you will be employed by UCG, with Swedish salary and benifits.



As a consultant you may be placed at different customers. UCG will assist with extra training when needed. As a consultant we need you to be flexible and to easily adapt to a new environment.

demos.

headline: Senior DevOps Engineer med Azure-erfarenhet
description.text:
Ingress
Har du ett stort intresse för programmering? Är du kreativ och tycker om utmaningar? Vi söker just nu två seniora DevOps ingenjörer till en stor finansiell kund i Stockholm.

Dina arbetsuppgifter
Som DevOps Engineer kommer du att arbeta med hela utvecklingsprocesser och hantera allt från design av process till produktionsstöds utvecklig och drifttagning. Tillsammans med ett team utvecklar, driftar, distribuerar, integrerar och övervakar du applikationer i ett automatiserat flöde.

Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av programvaruteknik i en snabb och leveransfokuserad miljö. Du kommer att arbeta med en molnplattform som ligger till grund för vår kunds konkurrenskraftiga finansiella system. Därför lägger du stor vikt vid säkerhetstänk när du utformar lösningar.

Din profil
Du som söker besitter en teknisk och analytisk bakgrund och innehar programmeringskunskaper i TypeScript, JavaScript eller Python. Vidare har du erfarenhet av automationsverktyg såsom Terraform, Azure Resource Manager och Docker.

Eftersom vi söker seniora personer för uppdraget ser vi gärna att du besitter minst tre år arbetslivserfarenhet av liknande uppdrag. Viktigt att du talar flytande engelska, såväl muntligt som skriftligt.

Meriterande
? Praktisk erfarenhet av att bygga API-baserade lösningar
? 
? Kunskaper i Shell Scripting

Anställningsform
Den här tjänsten är ett konsultuppdrag som innebär att du initialt anställs hos Westro. Som konsult hos oss är du en värdefull medspelare med potential som vi tillsammans hjälps åt att utveckla på din nya arbetsplats. Vi utgår alltid från dig som individ och just därför ser vi att du jobbar med oss, inte för oss.

Din ansökan
Låter uppdraget intressant? Du söker tjänsten genom att ansöka via formuläret i annonsen. Om du har några frågor eller funderingar kring anställning eller rekryteringsprocess är du varmt välkommen att höra av dig till ansvarig rekryteringskonsult.

Kandidaturval och intervjuer sker löpande vilket betyder att tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas före sista ansökningsdatum. Tveka därför inte på att skicka in din ansökan redan idag – vi är nyfikna på att komma i kontakt med dig.

Lycka till och välkommen med din ansökan!

Om företaget
Information om kundföretaget ges vid intervjutillfälle.

Om Westro
Westro är en tjänsteleverantör som arbetar med kvalitativ och kundorienterad kompetensförsörjning. Vi hyr ut och rekryterar kompetens och kvalificerad personal inom IT, vård och tjänstemannasektorn. En stor del av vår arbetsprocess tillägnas att lyssna in önskemål och behov hos såväl kund som konsult för att på så vis bidra med framgångsrika matchningar.

Hos oss på Westro är du inte en arbetspjäs, du är en värdefull medspelare med potential som vi värnar om. Vi erbjuder därför goda arbetsförhållanden där du som konsult alltid har möjlighet att påverka din framtida karriär. Vår ambition är precis likt din egen att du ska trivas, må bra och få möjlighet till personlig och yrkesmässig utveckling. Alltid.

Vill du veta mer? Besök vår hemsida: https://www.westro.se/

headline: Exjobb - DevOps i framkant
description.text:
Är du i slutet av dina studier och ska göra exjobb? På Combitech har vi spännande exjobb i teknikens framkant! Vi vill att du i din vardag ska få göra skillnad för människor, verksamheter och samhälle. Vill du vara med på vår resa? Sök Combitechs exjobb!





Din roll som exjobbare

På Combitech är vi ett DevOps team som jobbar med att ta fram praktiska exempel på LoRaWAN och 4G/5G applikationer för att skapa förståelse för våra kunder, samt skapa extra försäljning till vårt system.



Ditt bidrag blir att ta fram en eller flera fungerande applikation/er för kund-demos. Uppdraget innebär programmering av LoRaWAN devices, GW's och back-end samt visualisering. Ett förslag är att monitorera våra bokningsbara företagsbilar, antingen via sensorer och/eller bildanalys och visa när de är i sin ruta. Exjobbet skulle även kunna innebära automatisk styrning av en liten drönare.





Vad kan du tillföra?

Vi söker en till två personer som trivs i en miljö med självstyrande team där teamet har gemensamt ansvar för allt från systemering till verifiering och IT-miljö.



Vi söker dig eller er som läser en 5-årig ingenjörsutbildning inom programvaruutveckling och har erfarenhet av publish-subscribe nätverk, MQTT samt minst ett objektorienterat språk. Vi jobbar främst med C#, och kunskap i C# är därför meriterande.



Vi tror att den eller de som kommer att genomföra detta exjobb, är personer som trivs med att arbeta i en omväxlande miljö där problemlösning är en naturlig del av vardagen. Ni gillar att ställas inför kluriga problem där ni utmanas och ges möjlighet att utveckla era färdigheter tillsammans med andra.



Låter det intressant? Hör av dig till oss eller skicka in din ansökan på direkten. Urvalet sker löpande.





Kom och gör skillnad

Hos Combitech erbjuder vi, utöver spännande och utvecklande kunduppdrag, anställningstrygghet och förmånspaket, samtidigt som du får chans att växa i en företagskultur som uppmuntrar både personlig och professionell utveckling samt balans i livet.



Combitech GROW, vårt forskningsbaserade kompetensutvecklingsprogram, ingår som en naturlig del i din anställning. 



Hos oss är du med och utvecklar teknikområdet för att möta kraven från framtidens digitala samhälle. Vi har exempelvis många spännande projekt inom digitalisering, autonomi, artificiell intelligens, cyber security och 5G-utveckling. Våra konsulter utvecklar också bland annat flygande hjärtstartare som räddar liv, system som ökar säkerheten på flygplatser och nya stridsflygplanet Gripen E som gör samhällen trygga.



Vill du veta mer om hur det är att arbeta hos oss? Kolla in våra karriärsidor på vår webb!

headline: Software Developer with DevOps specialisation
description.text:
Summary

APSIS is now looking for a Software Developer with DevOps specialisation!

Work Description

Our new APSIS One platform is built from the ground up using brand new cloud-native technology and methods. We are now looking to strengthen our Audience team, who builds the core data processing and storage layers in our platform. This domain involves advanced data intensive systems engineering including managing a complex environment of AWS cloud infrastructure. It includes working with databases of many flavors, managed and self-hosted on EC2, and managing multiple distributed systems and data processing pipelines with very high demands on performance and correctness.

APSIS aims to work at the forefront of technology and development. We follow modern agile practices with cross-functional DevOps teams, where each team assumes complete technical and operational ownership of their applications, including not only implementation but full architectural design and tech selection, QA, continuous delivery, and technical production environment operations. We believe in small, highly skilled, highly empowered and autonomous teams taking maximal ownership of their systems. We believe in DevOps as a culture rather than a specialised role; but his role is geared towards mid-level software developers who would like to specialise further into cloud infrastructure and devops type work, while working as part of a DevOps team.

In a typical day this role will be working in close collaboration with team members and other similar teams in Stockholm, Malmö, Warsaw and Russia, and with the Product Owner. 



Responsibilities

- As part of the development team, support implementation of new features and solve cloud infra and engineering challenges in a modern, cloud-native, microservice-based tech stack based on Java.
- Be part of shaping our team’s development processes, system architecture, tools and practices to increase team velocity and developer quality of life, with extra focus on CI/CD pipelines and management of the teams’ complex cloud infra.

- Respond to disruptions and proactively work to prevent such from occurring in the first place. 


Requirements

- 3+ years professional development experience with a robust software engineering background including professional experience from software architecture, security, and operating production systems
- Several years of experience with Java and hands-on experience with Java 11
- BS or higher from a computer science program, or equivalent professional experience
- Professional experience with using Amazon Web Services (particularly EC2, ECS, RDS, API Gateway, CloudWatch, and supporting tools like IAM) and Docker in production systems

- Creative and solutions-oriented, someone who enjoys tackling big challenges and is not afraid to learn new things along the way

- Proven ability to write high-performant, maintainable code with strong elements of concurrency and complex data models
- Collaborative mindset, ability to work as part of a very distributed development organisation where many small teams need to coordinate
- Hands-on experience with Infrastructure-as-Code using CloudFormation
- Hands-on experience with Ansible


Primary technologies


- All environments are hosted on AWS and architecture makes extensive use of services such as ECS, RDS/Aurora, S3, Athena, and all the AWS supporting services.
- Open source tools and frameworks are also extensively used, such as Presto


Bonus points for

- Looking forward the team is planning to migrate towards serverless tech and/or kubernetes. Specific technologies might include EKS, App Mesh, MSK, the AWS Code* pipeline tools.
- AWS certifications or equivalent evidence of advanced AWS competency
- Experience from both development and technical operations / infrastructure / system administration
- Experience with distributed systems engineering
- Advanced knowledge of database technologies, NoSQL and/or Analytics engines
- Professional experience with building SaaS software, especially from web analytics or digital marketing or equivalen


Position type

Full time


Please apply by providing your CV and a personal letter as soon as possible. We will hire as soon as we find the right person.



About us
At APSIS, we believe in enabling great marketing for our customers. As the leading provider of marketing solutions in the Nordics, our goal is to enable and simplify the workloads of our many global clients every day. We do this by creating simple yet scalable tools within digital marketing, including data management, targeted emails, lead management and e-commerce recovery. At the end of the day, it all comes down to one thing: our clients’ marketing success is our success. And we’re proud to be there for them, every step of the way. ...Intrigued? Find out more at apsis.com!

headline: senior devops engineer in gothenburg
description.text:
Randstad technologies are looking for a senior DevOps engineer for one of our clients. Here you will be working with a team of junior DevOps engineers, supporting and maintaining their ETL system. You will work in a CI/CD pipeline, with management and improvements. Our client has an existing AWS infrastructure and focus will be with administration and improvements of that. You will also work with storage, as well as ensuring availability and high reliability of all system components.


Randstad Technologies is specialized in competences within IT. As a consultant with us, you get a competitive salary, benefits and collective agreements. Your consultant manager is always there for you and ensures that you get varying and developing assignments at different companies, within different industries. At Randstad Technologies, your personal development is in focus, and you are offered a large network and many social activities.

Responsibilities
Support and maintain Data management ETL system
Ensure data are stored and distributed in a secure manner
Automate maintenance processes
Manage, Improve and enhance the CI/CD pipeline
Administer and improve existing AWS infrastructure
Ensure high reliability and availability of all the components of the system


Working hours
Full time



Qualifications



On the technical side we are looking for someone with:


-Very good knowledge of AWS tools.


-Knowledge of Elastic Search.


-Good networking skills.


Apart from you also need to have competences in Java, scripting, SQL, CICD pipeline and API Management


If you also have knowledge in Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes that is a bonus.


We are looking for candidates with a strong sense of responsibility, someone with leadership qualities and interest in knowledge sharing. You also have a technical interest, a curiosity and willingness to develop in the DevOps area.


Our client needs someone who is confident in their knowledge, someone who quickly finds their way in a new organization and environment and paves the way for others in the team.


For us, it is important that all competence and skills in the labor market are utilized. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity.

Experience
Minimum five years’ experience from a DevOps position.

Application
2020-12-20, selection and interviews will be ongoing. 




About the company
Randstad Technologies specializes in the field of IT and is part of Randstad, the world leader in recruitment and consulting with operations in 38 countries. With this global network, in combination with our strong local foundation, we can offer a wide range of varied and developing assignments and jobs for you who are a specialist in IT. Our mission is to help you reach your true potential with your career in focus!

headline: Junior DevOps till energisektorn, Stockholm
description.text:
Om konsultuppdraget

- Ort: Stockholm
- Uppdragslängd: ca. 1 år
- Sista ansökningsdagen: ansök snarast
- Uppdragsstart: Enl. ök.
- Omfattning: 100%
- OBS! Det är väldigt viktigt att du uppfyller skall-kraven för att vi överhuvudtaget ska kunna offerera dig, annars förkastar beställaren vårt anbud omgående där både din tid resp. vår tid går till spillo.


Bakgrund

Nya IT-lösningar introduceras som bl.a. bygger på Kafkaplattformen och till Kundens IT-förvaltning och nu behöver Kunden förstärka med en konsult som stötta i arbetet med förvaltning och IT-drift.

Uppdragsbeskrivning

För att stödja Kunden med att hantera de nya IT-lösningarna behöver de nu en DevOps Engineer som kan Kafkaplattformen. I uppdraget ingår även att axla rollen i Kundens förvaltning som applikationsansvarig IT för denna plattform. Konsulten kommer arbeta tillsammans med pågående projekt inom området och IT-förvaltningar.

Arbetsuppgifterna är:

- Driva och utföra uppgraderingar och systemförbättringar
- Installera, konfigurera och i övrigt iordningställa nya miljöer, t.ex. för tillkommande behov framöver
- Ge stöd och support till interna och externa parter
- Följa upp och samordna med andra IT-förvaltningar, driftsorganisationer och intern personal
- Samordna olika typer av tester samt även kunna genomföra delar av dem själv
- Hantera IT-incidenter för sina system och delta i felsökning och samordning av insatser
- Uppdatera dokumentation för systemen t.ex. drift- och förvaltningsanvisningar respektive systemberoenden
- Delta i arbete med IT-säkerhet genom att bistå vid risk- och sårbarhetsanalyser, omvärldsbevaka informationssäkerhet mm
- Koordinera men även utföra IT-förändringsfrågor tillsammans med interna och externa intressenter och systemleverantörer
- Bistå vid teknisk kravspecificering och framtagande av nya lösningar
- Bistå vid utarbetning av förvaltningsplan, planera för systemunderhåll, samt planera och genomföra förändringar
- Delta i etableringen av förvaltningen av Kafka-plattformen


Säkerhetsprövning

Säkerhetsprövning av leverantör och konsult kan komma att krävas med anledning av att konsulten kommer hantera hemliga uppgifter. För aktuellt uppdrag krävs säkerhetsskyddsavtal 2 med leverantören samt registerkontroll av aktuell konsult för uppdraget. Processen för upprättande av SUA-avtal beräknas ta ca 8 till 10 veckor men kan både ta längre och kortare tid. Om upprättandet av SUA-avtal och registerkontroll blir klar innan angiven tidplan för uppdragsstart ser Kunden gärna att konsulten påbörjar sitt uppdrag tidigare i överenskommelse med aktuell beställare från Kunden.

Obligatoriska kompetenser och erfarenhet (skallkrav):

- Högskole/universitetsutbildning omfattande minst 120p/180hp inom IT, alternativt motsvarande utbildning eller arbetslivserfarenhet
- Minst ett års erfarenhet av arbete med systemadministration av Apache Kafka-plattformar, där installationer, konfiguration och uppgraderingar har ingått
- Minst tre års erfarenhet av arbete med tekniska miljöer och IT-system när det gäller vidmakthållande (d.v.s. felrättningar, användarstöd, daglig IT-drift och underhåll) och vidareutveckling (d.v.s. anpassningar och förbättringar)
- Minst ett års erfarenhet av arbete med IT-drift i Linux-miljö där t.ex. systemadministration och shell-scripting ingår.


Meriterande kompetenser och erfarenhet (börkrav):

- Minst ett års erfarenhet av arbete med att bygga och optimera flöden med stora datamängder (big data)
- Minst två års erfarenhet av arbete med att hantera containerplattformar som Docker och Kubernetes
- Minst två års erfarenhet av operativt arbete med IT-säkerhet för verksamhetskritiska system
- Minst två års erfarenhet från att ha arbetat i uppdrag/projekt där DevOps och CI/CD har varit etablerat och använt


Annat

Nedanstående personliga egenskaper säkerställs via referenser och vid eventuell intervju. Kunden förbehåller sig rätten att kontakta egna relevanta referenser (än de som leverantören själv angivit) för att säkerställa uppfyllande av krav.

- God samarbetsförmåga och initiativförmåga
- Flexibel och anpassningsbar efter arbetsbelastning
- Utåtriktad och tydlig i sin kommunikation
- Ödmjuk och ha lätt för att skapa förtroende
- Arbetar självständigt och målinriktat
- Fallenhet för administrativa arbetsuppgifter
- Förmåga att arbeta i grupp


______________________

Hur du kommer vidare

- Sök uppdraget genom denna annons
- I ansökan anger du ett kravställt timpris
- Lägg in ett CV i word-format
- Vi återkopplar genom plattformen om något behöver kompletteras eller förtydligas.
- Återkoppling sker vanligtvis från Kunden till oss inom 10 arbetsdagar  från det att ansökningstiden utgått. Vi försöker återkoppla omgående till dig som kandidat snarast vi har ny information avseende din ansökan eller uppdraget. Skulle återkoppling dröja, vänligen kontakta oss via plattformen.


Inför en eventuell intervju meddelas du om vilken kunden är i god tid.



Konsult- och kompetenspartner inom IT, Management och Teknik.

Vi lägger ett stort fokus på kund-/konsultpartnernöjdhet och kvalité i våra leveranser och verkar idag i hela Sverige med utgångspunkt i Stockholm. Vårt motto är därför Ödmjukhet, Ihärdighet samt Flexibilitet.

Varmt välkommen att höra av dig vid frågor eller funderingar.

Annonsförsäljare undanbedes.

headline: Chas söker utvecklare inom DevOps
description.text:
Vi söker nu fler duktiga utvecklare inom DevOps som vill arbeta med spännande uppdrag som konsult hos oss på Chas!
JOBBA MED OSS
Tycker du att det är viktigt att jobba på ett företag som har högt ställda värderingar? Ett bolag där entreprenörskap och samhällsnytta går hand i hand. På Chas vill vi inte enbart satsa på att ge våra konsulter högsta möjliga kompetens och de allra bästa uppdragen. Vi vill också ge tillbaka till samhället. Vi tycker även att det är viktigt att ha kul, därför åker vi på en utlandskonferens varje år och har minst ett roligt event per månad. Alla på bolaget är välkomna! !
På Chas har vi individen i fokus och vill förverkliga konsultens potential genom att få dem att utvecklas och bredda sin kompetens. Vi arbetar med många häftiga företag inom olika branscher. Några exempel är DICE, Rovio, Spotify, H&M, SEB, Telenor och SAS. Det finns alltid något för alla. Chas driver sin egna skola där våra konsulter får gå kurser gratis. Kanske vill du som Chassare fördjupa dig i Node.Js eller lära dig Swift? Inga problem!
Chas är ett företag som verkligen satsar på CSR-arbete, vi tror på att göra mer än att bara donera pengar. Vi har hållit utvecklingskurser i socialt utsatta områden och delat ut mat till hemlösa. Vill du också vara med och påverka samhället och kanske har ett eget CSR-projekt du brinner för? Då vill vi prata mer med dig!
Tillsammans här på Chas delar vi många erfarenheter, värderingar, förmåner och intressen. Det är vi tillsammans som utgör Chas och att vara en Chassare innebär att du blir en del av vår familj!
OM JOBBET
Vi söker dig som jobbat med DevOps i minst 2 år och har goda kunskaper inom backend-språk som: Python, Node.js, SQL och Java, samt att du suttit i Azure. Det är meriterande om du tidigare arbetat med AWS.
Självklart är du en lagspelare som lätt arbetar i team eller på egen hand om så krävs.
OM OSS
Chas har utsetts till Europas bästa arbetsgivare av European Business Awards som arrangerar Europas största företagstävling. Bland annat för vårt demokratiska arbetssätt med möjlighet till inflytande för medarbetarna samt vårt sätt att arbeta med förmåner och personlig karriärutveckling. Resultatet är att vi bedriver ett omfattande CSR-arbete, har startat upp en YH-skola som utbildar nya fullstack-utvecklare och har ett produktbolag.


Som anställd på Chas erbjuder vi dig möjlighet att arbeta med nya moderna tekniker hos våra kunder som är marknadsledande företag inom privat och offentlig sektor. Vi ger dig tillfälle att delta i konferenser och att utvecklas som person och som webbutvecklare. Du får också en mentor och access till vårt utbud av personalförmåner.

headline: DEVOPS ENGINEER WITH CLOUD EXPERIENCE
description.text:
We are looking for a DevOps Engineer skilled within Cloud. If you would like to be part of a dynamic environment where you get the opportunity work with the latest technologies, then ALTEN could be a great match for you!

What we offer you at ALTEN
Every employee is equally valuable in the success of ALTEN! We are driven by making people grow and develop, which is why we offer you the opportunity to work with what you are truly passionate about. At ALTEN, we have a broad range of assignments at most of the leading companies in Sweden in several different sectors, to make it possible for your wishes to come true. We offer both national and international opportunities and together with your coaching manager, you build your career path so you constantly are able to develop and achieve your goals and dreams!

As a consultant at ALTEN, you will get the genuine team feeling at your assignment but also a wonderful togetherness at ALTEN. All activities are of course optional. Work life balance is our top priority. We also have a collective agreement and other benefits like Pension, Insurances and Wellness grants.
We believe in growing together!

We believe you have a developer background and are passionate about DevOps and have experience within this over the last few years. You are no stranger to methods like Scrum and you probably master languages like Python and Java. Perhaps you also have experience as a technical consultant or advisor.

Mandatory qualifications:
• Minimum 1 year hands on experience with DevOps
• At least 3 years of experience as a developer

• CI/CD

• Docker and Kubernetes


Important qualifications:
• Java or C#

• Terraform
• Postgres
• Frontend technologies
• Agile development methods like Scrum

headline: DevOps Engineer to Tobii Tech
description.text:
Tobii is the world leader in eye tracking – a technology that allows a computer to tell exactly where a person is looking. Eye tracking is used in a broad range of applications including market research and eye-controlled computer interfaces. Headquartered in Stockholm Tobii covers the global market with offices in USA, China, Japan, Norway, UK, and South Korea. If you want to work with meaningful products and solve interesting problems, we might be the right company for you!
You will work in a team that supports the rest of the organization with infrastructure for both builds and distributed computing. 
With an infrastructure as code mentality and modern tools reached a state where we enable the organisation to run hundreds of concurrent builds and analysis jobs in the cloud.
Role and responsibilities
As a Build Engineer, you will be responsible for both improvements in our build and data infrastructure as well as making sure our systems are performing as expected.
Your days will be filled with
Troubleshoot and fix problems in our infrastructure (both simple and quite advanced problems can happen)
Work on short and long term improvements
Follow industry trends and continue using the best practices.
Actively expand the diverse skillset required by many components in our responsibility

We are looking for someone with
At least few years work experience from similar roles
Some sort of advanced scripting / developer background
Experience from many of the following tools and technologies:
Docker products, in particular docker and docker compose
Ansible or similar tools

Binary repository, Artifactory or similar
Git

Managing, configuring and setting up cloud infrastructure services and virtual machines in Microsoft Azure or similar

Experience working with and managing worker farm / distributed computing / task management systems is a big plus. We hope that you want to help shape our work. 
Apply today!

headline: Chas söker utvecklare inom DevOps
description.text:
Vi söker nu fler duktiga utvecklare inom DevOps som vill arbeta med spännande uppdrag som konsult hos oss på Chas!
JOBBA MED OSS
Tycker du att det är viktigt att jobba på ett företag som har högt ställda värderingar? Ett bolag där entreprenörskap och samhällsnytta går hand i hand. På Chas vill vi inte enbart satsa på att ge våra konsulter högsta möjliga kompetens och de allra bästa uppdragen. Vi vill också ge tillbaka till samhället. Vi tycker även att det är viktigt att ha kul, därför åker vi på en utlandskonferens varje år och har minst ett roligt event per månad. Alla på bolaget är välkomna! !
På Chas har vi individen i fokus och vill förverkliga konsultens potential genom att få dem att utvecklas och bredda sin kompetens. Vi arbetar med många häftiga företag inom olika branscher. Några exempel är DICE, Rovio, Spotify, H&M, SEB, Telenor och SAS. Det finns alltid något för alla. Chas driver sin egna skola där våra konsulter får gå kurser gratis. Kanske vill du som Chassare fördjupa dig i Node.Js eller lära dig Swift? Inga problem!
Chas är ett företag som verkligen satsar på CSR-arbete, vi tror på att göra mer än att bara donera pengar. Vi har hållit utvecklingskurser i socialt utsatta områden och delat ut mat till hemlösa. Vill du också vara med och påverka samhället och kanske har ett eget CSR-projekt du brinner för? Då vill vi prata mer med dig!
Tillsammans här på Chas delar vi många erfarenheter, värderingar, förmåner och intressen. Det är vi tillsammans som utgör Chas och att vara en Chassare innebär att du blir en del av vår familj!
OM JOBBET
Vi söker dig som jobbat med DevOps i minst 2 år och har goda kunskaper inom backend-språk som: Python, Node.js, SQL och Java, samt att du suttit i Azure. Det är meriterande om du tidigare arbetat med AWS.
Självklart är du en lagspelare som lätt arbetar i team eller på egen hand om så krävs.
OM OSS
Chas har utsetts till Europas bästa arbetsgivare av European Business Awards som arrangerar Europas största företagstävling. Bland annat för vårt demokratiska arbetssätt med möjlighet till inflytande för medarbetarna samt vårt sätt att arbeta med förmåner och personlig karriärutveckling. Resultatet är att vi bedriver ett omfattande CSR-arbete, har startat upp en YH-skola som utbildar nya fullstack-utvecklare och har ett produktbolag.


Som anställd på Chas erbjuder vi dig möjlighet att arbeta med nya moderna tekniker hos våra kunder som är marknadsledande företag inom privat och offentlig sektor. Vi ger dig tillfälle att delta i konferenser och att utvecklas som person och som webbutvecklare. Du får också en mentor och access till vårt utbud av personalförmåner.
